mapper.select: select w.worker_id,w.worker_account,w.worker_password,w.worker_name,w.worker_phone,w.worker_age,w.worker_sex,w.worker_address,w.worker_state, (select r.role_name from t_role as r where w.role_id=r.role_id) roleName from t_worker as w where w.worker_account = #{workerAccount} and w.worker_password=#{workerPassword} limit 1
